# Class IntentMatch

Class representing a matched intent. Contains information about an intent that was detected in user input.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy getName getScore

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this intent match.

#### Returns void




### getName

  * getName(): string

Gets the name of the matched intent.

#### Returns string

Name of the matched intent




### getScore

  * getScore(): number

Gets the confidence score of the intent match.

#### Returns number

Confidence score (typically between 0 and 1)

  * Protected
  * Inherited
